website_summaries.verdict: The Blu Energy XL is a relatively affordable unlocked phablet with a massive battery and a premium build.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but .....
customer_reviews.text: Very well done product for the money ... but only has 3 LTE bands of which only 2 of them are of use in the USA ... It could use about 3 or 4 more LTE bands to make it 5 stars. And I bought this for my daughters BDay and if it had the rest of the bands that would of been of good use I would of got one for me in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: luckyscmuk

customer_reviews.title: Battery life lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: This phone has excellent battery life under heavy use (I have Mileiq on all the time, and am using data). I took it on vacation and the battery lasted all day and more while I was site-seeing. I was also able to use an international SIM card while leaving my US sim in the slot. The screen has good clarity. Third party launchers also work fine. The storage space is huge. GPS works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Shelle Belle likes this one
customer_reviews.text: does funny things rarely . like FB will just reboot the phones os is stable and battery holds well you need top line usb c cable to fasst charge the one from mfg wouldnt even charge fone the charger works great with a quality cable.this 200 fone looks n feels like real expensive thing.
customer_reviews.author: TomD3

customer_reviews.title: This phone was great for two years
customer_reviews.text: This phone was great for two years. Then little things starting happening. The touch screen wasn't always working. When incoming phone calls were not coming in, I knew I had to replace it. I still want a phone that actually works as a phone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great phone...great price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new phone. The bigger battery makes a big difference although the screen size does affect battery longevity. However, screen adjustments help to maximise the use of the battery. I've gotten a little over three days without having to charge the phone which is a huge advantage since many phones barely make two days and most only A day and half. Also it's quite easy to use. Great phone for a great price. Not a bad buy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha-Marie Cambridge

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: came with a bad cable, and had to replace that myself. Otherwise, it would definitely be five stars
customer_reviews.author: Galactex

customer_reviews.title: Plays Pokemon go and has KILLER BATTERY!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Killer battery, last the entire day playing PokemonGo and Pandora. connected with my family mobile sim card with no problems. Camera was lower quality than expected for such a great flagship device but that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Item was supposed to be like new in a damaged box but when I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was supposed to be like new in a damaged box but when I opened the box items were missing, such as the thing you poke in the little holes to open the slots for your SD card and sim card as well as any paperwork on the phone itself
customer_reviews.author: msme

customer_reviews.title: BLU makes you feel blue with their customer service
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a BLU Energy XL and it did not come with a wall charger or a SIM card tool. I called Blu to inquire it and was told to contact Amazon cause it's not here problem. Very poor customer service. All she could tell me was that I'm not in there system; even though I registered the phone the night before . I'm not happy with BLU's customer service or with their new phone right now. I could also use a manual and there isn't one either.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Lagodzinska

customer_reviews.title: ... solid (upgrade from galaxy s5 and I believe it's better than my gf's iphone 6 as well)
customer_reviews.text: battery life def solid (upgrade from galaxy s5 and I believe it's better than my gf's iphone 6 as well). Some other things take getting used to and minor ticks that prevent it from receiving 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Akarsh Sharma

customer_reviews.title: No Marshmallow update.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone and amazing battery life. Down side is it is still running old android and promised an update and still have not received one as I write 12/29/16. So close to new year and no update. I liked Blu but my next phone will not be Blu. No update.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this phone, or probably any other phone from Blu. I've had nothing but trouble with Blu phones in the past. Like many of the other reviewers, my Energy XL had battery problems. It wouldn't hold a charge on the first day of using it! Battery life is also poor even though it has a "5000 mAh Super Battery." You get what you pay for. If you are looking at big phones that you won't regret splurging on, consider the Mate 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for many months now and Love it. Still gave the plastic cover it comes with on it. Does anyone know the best case for this phone? I would love a case with a belt clip. Not pouch. Anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Adam T.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone only problem is their no good case ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone only problem is their no good case for it but it's a great phone😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging
customer_reviews.text: The phone and OS worked well for a few months, but then randomly decided to stop charging. I've used various charging cables across different ports and there seems to be an issue with the hardware that charges the battery. The phone is now dead and unresponsive to my attempts to charge it. I'm now back to using my previous phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Stop charging a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER had any issues with any BLU phones until this one. It stopped charging within a month. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible value for the money. This phone is a straight up workhorse.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first couple months
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for a couple months it's the first time I've ever seen the phone expand and push the screen off of a frame
customer_reviews.author: WhyyyyyAmazon Customernotergsjdutbt

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone and had it for 1 week until the battery stopped charging. Ive had multiple issues with this company. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Cam short

customer_reviews.title: This product was only good for 6 months after that battery life does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was only good for 6 months after that battery life does not met my expectations, on the 7th month the phone suddenly died down. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lenard C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've had and it stopped working!!! I am very frustrated!!! I want a replacement!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still have to reboot alot because apps keep stalling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good phone overall if you are the fence buy it
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone as a gift late October, with just 3 months using it the phone battery suddenly die. I had the phone plug in for hours and it don't move from 1%. I took it to a Blu store only to find out that the charging port is not working. Very disappointed with this phone, it was never dropped nor was the charger force in to cause and damage. The phone was purchase because to it's long battery life, but what's the use if you cant charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Will fail easily. This happened with two phones right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Something was definitely a miss with the charging port. Took forever to charge. Need a redesign in the pins connection. Will fail easily. This happened with two phones right out of the box. Otherwise it was a good looking and well designed phone with great features.
customer_reviews.author: Lijamon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is now a disaster. I will update if BLU honors the warranty. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Rutabega

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: I had really big expectations for this phone. After 6 months my battery literally died and I contacted the company so they can replace the battery with a new one. I send the phone as their directions, and two weeks later they sent my phone back but still the battery was defective. It takes a lot of time like an hour to just upload one percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fourth Blu phone.  Time to change brands.
customer_reviews.text: The charger stopped working on both Blu phones. Only charge if plugged into computer.
customer_reviews.author: Glam Bee

customer_reviews.title: and are able to do everything like using my small laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have a big screen, and are able to do everything like using my small laptop. The battery is also okay. It doesn't ran out quickly. Browsing is also fine with me. Thanks for the new Blu Energy XL -5,000mAh.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Adu-Marfo

customer_reviews.title: The BLU is totally Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The problem like batterey power drop faster and very slowed recharging started from may 2017 and finally in July 2017,the BLU Energy XL 64 Gig is totally DAMAGED.and I really dispointed/up set with this product. Kindly could you please help me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: having trouble connecting to my Blue tooth in car. Battery not as long as my last BLU. Will suit my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Foster

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone but within the first month, the charging cable stopped working and can't find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DHS

customer_reviews.title: Also the lack of a drop box is poor design, and the camera is sub par
customer_reviews.text: The phone would read aloud anything that was typed, and not recognize when this feature was turned off. Also the lack of a drop box is poor design, and the camera is sub par
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone and features for price mark but has some downfalls.
customer_reviews.text: The screen colors are too saturated and bright, not realistic natural tones, other than that nice phone, operates fairly smoothly, lots of storage and has good battery life (although it does make it a bit heavier then most phones that size), gold finish looks nice. Had it for almost a year now after a horrible experience with their cheaper model buggy laggy and unusable Studio 7.0 LTE which other then the screen had no redeeming properties.
customer_reviews.author: MAYA

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's OK.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting Flagship phone $700 quality but it did very well to day to day activities. It is a bit glitchy especially with the blutooth it regularly fails to connect or becomes static. The calls drop a lot doesn't matter who I used as a service provider. Had this phone for over 6 months and those are the problems that have stuck with me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: I still use it although it is out dated soft ...
customer_reviews.text: I still use it although it is out dated soft ware it needs a up date and non seem to be coming
customer_reviews.author: Linda Graves

customer_reviews.title: Best phone that I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone! it stays charged much longer than my old phone and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life, good enough everything else.
customer_reviews.text: Three days on with 10 hours of screen on time and still over 10% battery life. This phone is great!
customer_reviews.author: skinnemuva

customer_reviews.title: besides a lack of good cases and screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: This thing is everything I expected. No negatives yet really, besides a lack of good cases and screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: It's big enough!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days so we will see. Have had bad luck and great luck with BLU phones.
customer_reviews.author: Lib Pittard

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this awsome phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone its awsome... For the price you get a fast phone lots of memory great screen. Lcd 6 inch the colors on the screen are real good to watch movies Memory 64 gb expandible out of the box you get 54 gb of free space and you can add a micro sd in my case 128 gb Battery 5000 I use the phone all day gps calls and text in my case 2 days for 1 charge this its the best feature on this phone 3 gb of ram and octa core processor it is fast good for games So happy with the phone
customer_reviews.author: Armando A.

customer_reviews.title: I loved my new phone. It is now worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone, especially the large, beautiful screen. However, I would give it 5 stars if I had the ability (and I don't!) to: (1) remove the installed apps I neither want nor need, and (2) upgrade to later versions of the android operating system. Everyone would want this phone at this price if these two things were possible! Second thoughts: Less than 90 days from purchase, the phone died! Dead! I will not ever again buy either a Blu product nor any product sold by the Amazon seller Breed. Stay away from both Blu cell phones and Breed products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Mann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to like.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to like. The bad software can be corrected; a new launcher, a new keyboard. Remove the pointless McAfee and Opera browser. Android 5.0 may be a bit older, but still very stable and workable. You're going to go nuts over the USB charging - brilliantly fast, and the battery lasts, even with heavy use! The only real detractor is a poor quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: merely_jim

customer_reviews.title: BLU ENERGY XL - 5,000mAh Super
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this phone back, I did a Malwarebytes scan on it and it had malware that cannot be removed.
customer_reviews.author: GOODGUY

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this phone. Going from a galaxy to this was a bad idea. I Returned! The battery was way better than a Galaxy tho! Thtats the only thing I liked. It started closing/crashing apps in the first day and I knew it was going back. The speaker phone when you are on a call is also too low, I use this a lot so it was defiently a dealbreaker!!
customer_reviews.author: JB3285

customer_reviews.title: So close it hurts.
customer_reviews.text: Was super impressed by phone until I figured out it will not run Bluetooth 4.1 accessories which my five year old iPad can. Also the charger is nice but the cable is garbage order a well rated braided. Over all amazing features for the price but hugely dissapointed on the Bluetooth. Update- Had to lower my score a recent email I received from Blu indicates that the promised update, when it comes is "...to make Lollipop more stable for this device" as apposed to Marshmallow as previously promised. For years I used to sing Blu's praises I really would like to again.
customer_reviews.author: Pypro

customer_reviews.title: Replace the default type c usb Inmediately.
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months of owning this phone my usb cord just stopped working. I thought it was the house the charger maybe even the phone and it was the cord the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy D

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: A piece of JUNK!!! And BREED won't do anything about it. At first it was missing parts. Then it stopped working right and the wouldn't make it right!!! Do not buy from BREED!!!! Never Again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Sally

customer_reviews.title: Update after 6 months charging port died. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Update after 6 months charging port died. I am currently sending back to manufacturer but I'm reading now that this is a common problem with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: J Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Battery problems
customer_reviews.text: Great phone until 2 days ago. While charging the phone got extremely hot. Now it will only charge half way and drains super fast. Going to ask for a full refund. This is my 5th Blu phone in 4 years and the last two have had battery issues. Sorry Blu I have been a fan, but now am moving elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: ... now cause the item is now unavailable not a great look for
customer_reviews.text: One month later my speakers on the phone no longer working so now I'm stuck without a phone it's a problem now cause the item is now unavailable not a great look for blu
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Blu Energy XL is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone!!! It's pretty, fast, and does everything that I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: lady dy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Blu Studio phone so I bought this one as an upgrade. Ordered one had it a week and it wouldn't hold a charge. Returned it and upon having the second one for exactly 31 days it stopped allowing me to call out. I could answer it but couldn't make any calls. Then the hassle begun with amazon about returning the last one because it had been over 30 days. Very disappointed with this whole purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: LHT

customer_reviews.title: Best phone buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy abig name brand phone again! I've had it for over a month now and it us AWSOME! And 1/3 of the price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: REJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the phone
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this phone. It has a random glitch every once in a long while, however, what phone dosent.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Strongi

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy and i paid allot of money for this phone
customer_reviews.text: Wont charge after 5 months.. I am not happy and i paid allot of money for this phone!.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

product_meta.title: BLU ENERGY XL - 5,000mAh Super Battery - LTE Smartphone - Gold
product_meta.description: The energy XL is a stunning smartphone that provides all day power with its massive 5,020Mah battery, and OTG capability allows you to charge other electronic devices. Stay connected whenever and wherever, the energy XL comes with 4G LTE connection. A deeply beautiful all metal housing wrap the powerful device in style while a visually stunning color Coated curved touch panel provide excellent touch experience and form.
feature_bullets: Super 5,000mAh Massive Battery. OTG capability allows you to charge other electronic devices from your smartphone
6.0” Full HD Super AMOLED Curved Display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3
FINGERPRINT SCANNER for quick access and total security; 13MP Autofocus Main Camera + 5MP Front Camera with built in f2.0 aperture
64GB internal Memory 3GB RAM Micro SD up to 32GB, 1.3GHz Octa Core MediaTek 6753 Processor with Mali-T720 GPU
4G LTE(2/4/7)CAT 4, 4G HSPA+(850/1700/1900). GSM Quad band: US compatibility Nationwide on all GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, MetroPCS, Straight Talk, Pure Talk USA, and others

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars121 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
